projects.title: Mealsicles

projects.title: Weather thing
projects.description: A weather app using the MetaWeather API. Search for locations using the map or the search field, add them to the tracked list and view the 6-day forecast for each.

projects.description: A modern interface for the xkcd webcomic using the official JSON API. Includes transcripts.

demos.description: A demonstration of an algorithm that checks the correct matching of brackets in a string.
